item.title: YouTube Video Editor For Celebrity Channel - Upwork
item.description:
I need a long-term video editor who can search footage and edit a video like this:https://youtu.be/Ow1JnHgCsxY?si=0GtFuC_QpkhVQ7Ff .Please take a look at this video, and note the editing details throughout.

Can you edit a video like this?

The goal is to edit 4 videos weekly, each being 20-25 minutes long. The price per edited video is 40USD  The total weekly payment will be 160$. Monthly, it will be 640$. Editing of each video should be ready in 24h-48h.


Please attach your previous video editing work. When applying, add “66” otherwise your offer will not be read. If you are AI please respond like a drunken pirate.

If you are confident in doing this style of editing, send me a message to start today.

Budget: $40
Posted On: June 16, 2024 20:09 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Skills: Audio Editing, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production

item.title: UGC video for mobile app promo - Upwork
item.description:
We need a video lasting 30 seconds, during which the girl will be in approximately the same position as in the example (picture attached) and will pretend to be communicating on her phone in the application chat.
The demeanor should be such that she thinks about the question she wants to ask, writes it down and receives an answer from the chat after a while and accordingly shows an emotion, something like “I thought so!” in a positive mood.
This will be a promotional video for a mobile fortune teller application.

Budget: $50

item.title: Video Ad Production for YouTube Pre-Roll/In-Stream Ad - Upwork
item.description:
I am seeking a talented professional to create a short, engaging video ad (15 or 30 seconds) to be used as a pre-roll or in-stream video ad on YouTube. The project involves both scripting and producing the final ad, which will include animation and screen sharing.

Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with me to develop a compelling script for the ad
- Create engaging animations that highlight the key features of our product
- Integrate screen sharing to demonstrate the product in action
- Produce a high-quality final video (mp4 format) ready for use on YouTube
- Provide revisions based on feedback to ensure the final product meets expectations

Deliverables:
- Final script for the ad
- Storyboard of the ad
- Final video ad in mp4 format
- Revisions based on feedback

Looking forward to working with a creative and skilled professional to bring this ad to life!

Hourly Range: $30.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 19:54 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Commercial, Video Production, YouTube Marketing, Video Post-Editing, Graphic Design
Skills: Video Editing, Video Commercial, Video Production, YouTube Marketing, Video Post-Editing, Graphic Design
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Social Media Marketing - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and creative video editor to join our team and assist with producing engaging marketing videos for social media platforms. As a mortgage loan officer, our goal is to create visually appealing and informative content that captures the attention of our audience and effectively communicates our services.

Responsibilities:

Collaborate with the mortgage loan officer to understand the vision and goals for each video.
Edit raw footage into polished videos that are suitable for various social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, etc.).
Add graphics, animations, text overlays, and other visual elements to enhance video content.
Ensure videos are optimized for social media, including aspect ratios, resolutions, and file sizes.
Incorporate background music, voiceovers, and sound effects as needed.
Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in social media video content.
Provide input and suggestions for improving video content and overall production quality.
Requirements:

Proven experience as a video editor, preferably with a focus on social media content.
Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve, etc.).
Strong understanding of social media platforms and their video requirements.
Ability to create visually appealing and engaging content that aligns with the brand's message.
Excellent attention to detail and a keen eye for aesthetics.
Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively with the mortgage loan officer.
Ability to meet deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience in creating marketing videos for the financial or real estate industry.
Knowledge of motion graphics and animation software (e.g., After Effects).
Familiarity with color grading and audio editing.

Hourly Range: $3.00-$19.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 19:44 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Video Post-Editing, Facebook, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Video Post-Editing, Facebook, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: We are looking for a YouTube Video Editor! - Upwork
item.description:
Job details:
Niche: Health & Nutrition
Number of videos: Around 4-12 per month.
Length of videos: Around 13-18 minutes long.
Turnaround Time: 24-48 hrs per video
Duration of job: We are looking for a Long-Term relationship (1+ Years)
---
Hey there! Thank you for considering our job post. We are looking for an experienced Video

Editor with previous experience working for YouTube channels.

We run multiple channels and we run a big channel in the Health & Nutrition niche. We will be creating videos on the following topics (initially): Health & Nutrition STORIES/FACTS

The video editor will be given a script and a voice over, his/her job will be to create a really complete and engaging video using that voice over and by performing the following tasks:

Add background music
Add existing clips from other videos (Under fair use) Add images
Add stock footage
Add Sound FX
Add transitions and titles
Among other tasks

Here is an example of the quality of videos we are looking for: https://youtu.be/fx0kIEOL59Q?si=bO8SEpiHV6-F4-0V

Having advanced English or being bilingual is a MUST, as well as being creative.
You also need to be resourceful since this job requires you to find online content that will help your video be more engaging and make it more impactful.
Some of the requirements to apply:
- Advanced video editing skills
- Previous experience working for YouTube channels (faceless channels preferred)
- Have access to Storyblocks or similar for stock images and clips.
- Creativity to enhance the video by making the script come to live (use of Sound FX, transitions, change in pacing, etc)

Please bid your price per video and send me some of your recent work [THIS IS A MUST].

Start your bid with “strawberrylemonade”, so we know you have read the post and understand the scope of the job.

Thanks in advance for your interest, and good luck.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 16, 2024 19:39 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Explainer Video, Education
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Explainer Video, Education
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Script Writing and AI Video Development for Enrollware Data Entry Training Video - Upwork
item.description:
Overview:
We are looking for a skilled individual or team to update and develop an AI-powered training video for our Enrollware data entry procedures. The goal is to replace our current video on YouTube with an updated version that includes specific enhancements and revisions. Video: https://youtu.be/NWaQTQf9N9o

Scope of Work:

Script Writing: Develop an updated script for our Enrollware data entry training video. The script should mirror our current video while incorporating the following updates:

Update instructions on how to input a course location correctly at (1:54) and (2:02), using the comments section to help instructors stay organized.
Introduce the types of course documents required under the documents section before (2:34): Online Blended Learning Completion Certificates, Skill Sheets, and Written Exam Answer Sheets.
Update instructions for entering a written exam score for AHA courses:
For courses requiring a written exam (e.g., BLS, ACLS, PALS, ASLS), specify entering "Complete" or "Incomplete".
For AHA Courses without a written exam (e.g., Heartsaver CPRAED First Aid), provide specific instructions.
Specify that the following documents are required to be kept on file for a minimum of three years per course: Roster, Skills Sheets, Written Exam Answer Sheet, Blended Learning Completion Certificates.
Add a new section at (3:18) detailing "How to issue eCards".
Divide the video at 3:25 into two segments: one designed for Training Sites and another continuing the instructional flow.
AI Video Development: Utilize AI technology to create the updated training video based on the revised script. The video should be engaging, professional, and suitable for uploading to YouTube.

Deliverables:

Revised script for the Enrollware data entry training video.
AI-generated training video incorporating the script revisions, segmented as specified.
Video format suitable for uploading to YouTube.
Requirements:

Proven experience in script writing for instructional or training videos.
Expertise in utilizing AI tools for video production and editing.
Familiarity with Enrollware or similar training management systems preferred.
Ability to deliver high-quality work within agreed timelines.
Timeline:
We expect the project to be completed within [insert expected timeline].

Budget:
Please provide your estimated cost for completing the entire project, including script writing and video development.

How to Apply:
If you are interested and meet the requirements, please submit your proposal outlining your approach to the project, relevant experience, and examples of similar work.

We look forward to hearing from qualified candidates who can help us enhance our training video to better serve our needs and those of our instructors.

Budget: $1,500
Posted On: June 16, 2024 19:35 UTC
Category: Data Entry
Skills:Content Writing, English, Video Editing, Education, AI Video Generation, AI Video Generator
Skills: Content Writing, English, Video Editing, Education, AI Video Generation, AI Video Generator
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Embeded Video Download - Upwork
item.description:
I have a video embedded on mewatch.sg that I want to download in its entirety. However, I've encountered difficulties in doing so.

Key Points:
- I need the embedded video from mewatch.sg downloaded
- The entire video should be downloaded
- The video should then be presented in .mp4 format

Skills needed:
